title: Effective Design Strategies for Multi-Grade Classroom Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pedagogy and mathematics education theories
context.additional_context: A training program aimed at strengthening the ability to design and implement mathematics instruction in multi-age classrooms. Explores field applicability through case analysis and simulated lesson design

learning_goals: One can explain at least three instructional strategies for designing mathematics education in mixed-age classrooms
One can develop mathematical interaction activities tailored to multi-grade learner characteristics
One can propose operational plans for mixed-age mathematics classes in blended learning environments
One can suggest improvements for mixed-age mathematics education reflecting current research trends

resources: Mixed-Age Class Instructional Case Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
